about_the_game:
The Darkest Star Demo lets you take command a fleet a set battle against an enemy force.
This lets you get to grips with the turn based combat portion of the game and lets you play with multiple ship classes from battle cruisers to carriers.

We have also added in a phalange mode, see how long you can survive against waves of enemy units.

Come join us on the discord and tell us how well you have done.



Experience the unique missile combat and turn based tactics above a ruined base and fight amongst the destroyed remains of your allies.

Battle

The battle lets you control a small fleet against an enemy force, you font have to worry about the next battle so you can really go to town and explore the combat.



Survival Challenge

You start surrounded by gates. Enemy units will jointhe battle each turn. See how many rounds you can survive or if you can destroy all the gates and enemy units for a victroy.

We aren't going to lie, we don't know if you can even win!



Come join our discord and let us know how well you did. For the best scores we will be offering a prise.



We will work with you to design a ship that we will add into the full game, you can even write some background for it and chose a class name.

  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 1030

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Fight for survival by gathering a fleet of powerful space warships in a turn based rogue-like, Decisions are key as the battle evolves over multiple turns. Use a multitude of weapon systems and ship types to press home the attack with a unique turn based system.
